ThingDef.label: robotic eye
ThingDef.description: A robotic eye replacement. It is high resolution but still doesn't quite make up what an eye does. It doesn't bleed and feels no pain. It is the best possible workaround for a missing eye given the tech level.

ThingDef.label: robotic arm
ThingDef.description: A robotic arm replacement. It matches the biological performance but doesn't quite look as pretty. It packs a tougher punch than a biological arm. It doesn't bleed and feels no pain. It is suitable replacement for a natural arm.

ThingDef.label: robotic hand
ThingDef.description: A robotic hand replacement. It matches the biological performance but doesn't quite look as pretty. It doesn't bleed and feels no pain. It is suitable replacement for a natural hand.

ThingDef.label: robotic leg
ThingDef.description: A robotic leg replacement. It matches the biological performance but doesn't quite look as pretty. It doesn't bleed and feels no pain. It is suitable replacement for a natural leg.

ThingDef.label: robotic jaw
ThingDef.description: A robotic jaw replacement. It matches the biological performance but doesn't quite look as pretty. It doesn't bleed and feels no pain. It is suitable replacement for a natural jaw.

ThingDef.label: bionic hand
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial hand. Silenced mini-servos give great strength, while the biogel nerve-link gives exquisite control. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. It is better than a biological hand in almost every way.

ThingDef.label: bionic lung
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial lung. It has synthetic membranes for highly efficient gas exchange. It doesn't bleed and feels no pain. It is better than a biological lung in almost every way.

ThingDef.label: bionic kidney
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial kidney. It has synthetic membranes for highly efficient filtration. It doesn't bleed and feels no pain. It is better than a biological kidney in almost every way.

ThingDef.label: bionic liver
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial liver. It has synthetic membranes for highly efficient filtration. It doesn't bleed and feels no pain. It is better than a biological liver in almost every way.

ThingDef.label: painshunt
ThingDef.description: An advanced brain implant. It has greatly reduces the pain felt by the user. It is popular among underworld gladiators and fighting rings in urbworlds.

ThingDef.label: sleepshunt
ThingDef.description: An advanced brain implant. It has greatly reduces the tiredness experienced by the user, allowing them to be more productive each day. It is popular among university students in urbworlds and glitterworlds.

ThingDef.label: megashunt
ThingDef.description: An advanced brain implant. This combines the effects of the painshunt and sleepshunt. The user will experience less pain and require less sleep per day.

ThingDef.label: combat implant
ThingDef.description: A special brain implant of Glitterworld origin. This series has multiple offerings and this one will enhance a person's abilities in combat. It promises users will perform faster, learn quicker, and forget slower. It is the perfect implant for those chasing mastery.

ThingDef.label: domestic implant
ThingDef.description: A special brain implant of Glitterworld origin. This series has multiple offerings and this one will enhance a person's abilities in cooking, animals, and growing. It promises users will perform faster, learn quicker, and forget slower. It is the perfect implant for those chasing mastery.

ThingDef.label: creative implant
ThingDef.description: A special brain implant of Glitterworld origin. This series has multiple offerings and this one will enhance a person's abilities in social, art, and intellectual tasks. It promises users will perform faster, learn quicker, and forget slower. It is the perfect implant for those chasing mastery.

ThingDef.label: labor implant
ThingDef.description: A special brain implant of Glitterworld origin. This series has multiple offerings and this one will enhance a person's abilities in mining, construction, and crafting. It promises users will perform faster, learn quicker, and forget slower. It is the perfect implant for those chasing mastery.

ThingDef.label: medical implant
ThingDef.description: A special brain implant of Glitterworld origin. This series has multiple offerings and this one will enhance a person's abilities in medicine. It promises users will perform faster, learn quicker, and forget slower. It is the perfect implant for those chasing mastery.

ThingDef.label: sleepstopper
ThingDef.description: A special brain implant of Glitterworld origin. This will stop the user from naturally needing sleep. However, users who take substances might find themselves falling asleep anyway. It is popular among glitterworlds among students and doctors alike for the productivity boost experienced.

ThingDef.label: megastopper
ThingDef.description: A special brain implant of Glitterworld origin. This combines the painstopper and sleepstopper rendering the user superhuman. Same caveat from the sleepstopper, substance users might occassionally find themselves falling asleep or needing sleep.

ThingDef.label: archotech vibroblade
ThingDef.description: An artifical hand implant built by an archotech. It is a retractable blade that never dulls and cuts plasteel like butter. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.
